description: A traditional rose-pink dirndl dress in linen and cotton with a low-cut bodice

core:description.text: A charming traditional dirndl in rose-pink, crafted from a blend of crisp linen and soft cotton. The fitted bodice features a low-cut square neckline that displays a generous expanse of decolletage, laced at the front with darker pink ribbon. The full, gathered skirt falls to mid-calf, swaying pleasantly with each step. Delicate floral embroidery adorns the bodice edges in deeper rose and cream threads.
